website_summaries.verdict: Between how effectively it works on many materials and its fast-acting formula, you can’t beat the price for such a versatile mold and mildew stain remover.
pros: Foaming solution rapidly dissolves caked-on mold stains
Effective on a wide range of surfaces including glass, hardwood, and concrete
cons: May require more than one application to fully dissolve a strong stain

customer_reviews.title: The downstairs bathroom was pretty cruddy. While it did not restore the blackened ...
customer_reviews.text: My in-laws moved into a new to them old to the world house. The downstairs bathroom was pretty cruddy. While it did not restore the blackened corners of the shower walls to a brand new condition, after the first spray and set, there was definitely impressive improvement. I have used this product a handful more times and each time the areas are improved swiftly.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work great!
customer_reviews.text: The wife sprayed the lawn furniture with it and it worked well at cleaning those up but we bought it to remove mildew stains on Levolor blinds and it just didn't touch it. In fairness, the stains were very bad and had been on the backside of the blinds for a long time before we discovered them. Still seems like it should have taken off at least some of the staining.
customer_reviews.author: Deke

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: At least, it was cheap. I was out of my regular Tilex Mold and Mildew Root Penetrater, so I bought this. It did nothing, even after multiple attempts. I even let it sit overnight...nothing. I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for mold/mildew stain on fabric beach chair
customer_reviews.text: At best it only lightened some of the mold/mildew stains on stored beach chairs...even with hard brushing. To be clear, the stains are in the fabric seat and backrest not vinyl or hard plastic. It foams nicely and did not discolor the print pattern so no damage done. This was cheap so gave it a try. I guess I will keep it for the bathroom. Also tried some Oxi clean on one chair... with about the same results. I will try some home remedies next...shame to throw these chairs out.
customer_reviews.author: Blues Player

customer_reviews.title: Cleans boat seats very well
customer_reviews.text: I got this on a recommendation to clean my boat vinyl and it works great. I use this and a magic eraser and had my seats looking like new ones (almost). No bleach in the mix means it will not harm the seams.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Best of all the types I’ve tried
customer_reviews.text: I bought all types of mildew stain removers on the market. Most were bleach types and all but this harsh. I was very skeptical that this “green” product could match the harsh chemical contenders but since I wasn’t having much luck removing the black stains on my house aluminum siding I tried it. It didn’t get it perfect. But it did get it cleaner than all the others.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: The best of all
customer_reviews.text: I tried many other stain remover all cause very bad smell you can not work with. This is only product that done the job in less time, effort, and the smell is good
customer_reviews.author: M. Makey

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Smells very stinky... as if it was going to work.... but it didn't. It didn't get rid of the mold on the window a/c louvers. It didn't clean the shower walls. It did, however, make my hands tired from pumping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work, buy something with bleach
customer_reviews.text: This product didn't work on my bathroom tile. I'd say the amount of mold I have is moderate on a 7 or 8 tiles and caulking. I applied this four times on the same spot over 2 days but the mold has barely disappeared. I bet you need to scrub after applying this product which I didn't do since I don't want to breathe in any mold. Save your money and buy something with bleach. Just take the proper precautions!
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: No scrubbing needed
customer_reviews.text: I used this to clean my counter top ice maker. The thick foam coated the inside and after letting it sit for about 15 min then rinsing multiple times, it cleaned out all the mildew without the need to scrub any of the parts. I couldn’t reach the insides parts so this worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Shavon Battle

customer_reviews.title: Good costumer service.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. 1 of 2 wear broken. I took pictures of box but didn’t need to show them. I was refunded Immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Does not work and is not returnable. Purchased to use on mold in the kitchen sink area. Did it 5x. Didn't work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Sexton

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do the job
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in this product. Might work better if the foam didn't immediately start to drip down. So unless its on the floor it immediately starts dripping down. Won't buy again. Only brought to be honest, because I can't find Tilex anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: queenie

customer_reviews.title: Household Necessity
customer_reviews.text: When I was younger my dad taught me to use CLR when cleaning the bathroom and kitchen. Now that I'm older with my own little family, this product is a household necessity. The product doesn't leave a strong intoxicating odor, and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Chrishellea

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work very well
customer_reviews.text: First package was damaged and leaked out. Second package was also damaged, but product didn't leak out, so I gave it a try. Just doesn't work for mildew stains on boat vinyl seats. Tried repeatedly....same result. A waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W. Williams

customer_reviews.title: No CLR products ever again.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely useless! Just like their hard water remover, Had no effect whatsoever. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Kellert

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: This product didn't work as expected. The mold didn't even go away. We are used 'Lysol' mold and mildew product which works great, unfortunately it's out of stock due to Corona virus demand/supply issues. It's waste of money. I wish there's a way to get the money back. My suggestion don't buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: VC

customer_reviews.title: Does not work well
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive but ineffective... followed instructions by applying first, waiting for a while, and then scrubbing. The mold spot did fade a little but was not removed. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: ally

customer_reviews.title: A really good product
customer_reviews.text: My grocery store was sold out which is why I ordered online. This is a really good product and works within seconds. The smell isn’t strong either.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Harris

customer_reviews.title: Cleans Mildew when bleach cannot be used.
customer_reviews.text: I recently had showers remodeled with colored tiles. I cannot use a product with bleach. CLR Mold and Mildew Remover works beautifully. No more mildew and scum.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Mold comes off seats so easy I could not believe it
customer_reviews.text: This and the white eraser on boat seats is a miracle. Mold comes off seats so easy I could not believe it. I worked as easy as the you tube I saw. I would recommend this to everyone. Great, great, great product. Seller was quick in getting it to me.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Boy

customer_reviews.title: this stuff works
customer_reviews.text: I needed a cleaning agent for my boat (storage / bildge) areas on my Boston Whaler to eliminate some mold and mildew without using any bleach solvents. This stuff did the job as promised without causing any damage to my boat hull's gelcoat finish or wiring. Highly recommended for boat users. Thumbs UP!
customer_reviews.author: CRAIG G.

customer_reviews.title: Not the most effective product
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased other brands. This one is not as effective as other brands. Did little to the mildew in my bathroom
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK AS ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY - This does not work on mold or mildew stains even after 2 applications, letting it sit for over 30 minutes and scrubbing. Amazon customer service was great and refunded my money.
customer_reviews.author: adamsonamazon

customer_reviews.title: Ahhh it's ok
customer_reviews.text: It's ok didn't remove the mold. It didn't really clean anything. I had better luck with vinegar.
customer_reviews.author: adyR

customer_reviews.title: Not good to clean mold in front load laundry machine.
customer_reviews.text: I was hopping this product would work to remove the mold in my front load washer door but it did not work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT REMOVE SIMPLE MOLD
customer_reviews.text: DID NOT REMOVE SIMPLE MOLD IN SHOWER THEY DON'T DO RETURNS
customer_reviews.author: suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Did nothing. Just use bleach.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an alternative to bleach for some spots in my bathroom and came across this. Unfortunately, it did almost nothing. Tried it on the spots multiple times with zero affect. In the end I used a bleach/water mix that instantly fixed the spots and didn’t do any damage to my paint. Would recommend that instead of this
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t recommend this
customer_reviews.text: This is basically overpriced bleach... I don’t think it’s worth it
customer_reviews.author: Daria

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: Trying to substitute for tilex mold and mildew not as good
customer_reviews.author: Linda L.

customer_reviews.title: Good result
customer_reviews.text: It cleaned my shower tile and made it like new
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This was a life saver it! Definitely did the job
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Work
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing product. Did not remove mold as advertised despite repeated applications.
customer_reviews.author: H. C. Eads Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Mold and mildew remover
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be good value. I've yet to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It didn't work!
customer_reviews.text: I gave it a try and sprayed it at least 5 times on some moldy patches in my shower that blooms every several weeks (that my regular tilex/clorox effectively gets rid off) and nothing happened.
customer_reviews.author: Sally H.

customer_reviews.title: Product doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn’t work. I sprayed my bathroom’s mildew and 10 minutes later, as per instruction, the mildew is still there. Normally with Tilex that would have been gone. Unfortunately, Tilex is sold out everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Margarette Mentor

customer_reviews.title: Does not remove mildew
customer_reviews.text: Does not remove mold and mildew in porcelain shower crevices. Without bleach, nothing removes mildew and mold completely. Buy something with lysol or bleach in it.
customer_reviews.author: Minnesota

customer_reviews.title: Did not work.
customer_reviews.text: This did not work on the mold in the bathroom at all. Was very disappointed with this product. I only had a little mold starting in one corner and have sprayed it 3 times a day for 2 days and scrubbed it. Going to buy a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because right now it’s impossible to get the Lysol mold remover. It does absolutely nothing to remove a few spots around the bath, whereas with Lysol, the mold is gone after ten minutes. Don’t bother with this.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda P

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t do the job
customer_reviews.text: Did not remove the mold & mildew on the shower tiles...product was weak...like I was spraying water on the tiles.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne M. Weber

customer_reviews.title: useless product!
customer_reviews.text: It did nothing for me...Neither is it cleaning the mold/mildew nor taking the stains away....all that comes out of it is just foam that does nothing to clean..
customer_reviews.author: Jay A

customer_reviews.title: Does not work.
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money. Tried on 3 different surfaces and no difference at all.
customer_reviews.author: bnb

customer_reviews.title: Total disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Has high hopes for this product to remove mildew and soap scum from my ceramic tile shower. Unfortunately after two uses, the product didn’t touch my problem areas in my shower. Sorely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Powers

customer_reviews.title: Product doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I used it for the mold in the bathroom and it didn’t work. It didn’t clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Enidza Hernandez

customer_reviews.text: Didn’t touch the boat mold. Finally scrubbed with mr Erase
customer_reviews.author: Two and Running

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Did nothing for a tiny bit of mold in a corner of my role. One spray of tylex and it was gone. I sprayed and sprayed this stuff and scrubbed with no results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kill that mold!
customer_reviews.text: Good for bathroom use in older homes where mold can be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work. I’m sorry I bought 3 because they cannot be returned. Lysol is 100% better and it does not require scrubbing.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper555

customer_reviews.title: Not Effective in removing mildew
customer_reviews.text: Does not remove mildew like Tilex does. Will not purchase again
customer_reviews.author: donna Albert

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Does not work at all. Do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nel

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t use
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for this, then I went to spray it and the entire spray mechanism broke so I can even use it.
customer_reviews.author: marissa gregory

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: I used it to remove mold from a bathtub and shower liner, did not do anything
customer_reviews.author: Dansko Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: There's a reason it's so cheap; doesn't do what it says. Buy something with bleach
customer_reviews.author: C B

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Improved from other products but it does not easily remove mildew.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Cheryl  Sanfacon

customer_reviews.title: Spray nozzle broken
customer_reviews.text: Spray nozzle is broken, so it doesn't work the way it is intended
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Bolton

customer_reviews.title: did not work
customer_reviews.text: did not remove any of the mold/mildew in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Mold and Mildews Best Friend - does not make it go away
customer_reviews.text: The product does not remove Mildew and Mold at all in our situation. Primary location we were trying to clean was the silicon caulking seal around the bottom of the shower. This was not grout, it is silicon sealant that is intended for wet locations/showers/bath tubs.
customer_reviews.author: Copper Robot

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: not really that good removing the mold in the shower
customer_reviews.author: Jane K

customer_reviews.title: Not any better than other mildew removers
customer_reviews.text: Not any better than other mildew removers. I put it in a cupboard, and the bottle LEAKED, the wood is severely damaged. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Christina B

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: Works alright. Go rid of what I needed it too. Got here on time aswell.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: did a good job, liked the fact it comes out as ...
customer_reviews.text: Used it on boat seats, did a good job, liked the fact it comes out as a foam, does not run off as much as others
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Works OK
customer_reviews.text: Removed some of the Mold that builds up from a turtle tank but I was a little dissapointed that it didn't work any better than the bleach water mixture i make myself. I have come to expect great results from CLR, which may be too high expectaions
customer_reviews.author: castle

customer_reviews.title: Great for tubs
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff! It comes in a foamer bottle, and it works like a dream on built-up soap scum in the tub, even better than cleaners with bleach. I though it would have a strong chemical smell, but it has barely any smell at all. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Servo

customer_reviews.title: For safety reasons do not purchase this product.
customer_reviews.text: We used this product once since receiving it. We keep it on kitchen counter top towards the back. As soon as I picked it up (for a second use) the liquid began pouring out from a puncture hole at the bottom corner. What a mess! The liquid was all over the kitchen, the floor, and me. It is strong solution. Cleaning and rinsing was required. I took a shower and used hand and body lotion for the irritation. This has never happened with our other spray products.
customer_reviews.author: Risë

customer_reviews.title: Used this product on the vinyl seats in my boat ...
customer_reviews.text: Used this product on the vinyl seats in my boat to remove mildew. It did not do a thing. Could not even tell the difference after using it.
customer_reviews.author: James L. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Had wonderful results.
customer_reviews.text: This product worked on all my bathoom . Had wonderful results.
customer_reviews.author: Doe Kush

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and time!
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted this to work but it didn't. I normally highly recommend CLR products. I needed to remove stains on my vinyl "pleather" boat seats. The mold and mildew stains were extensive. I have tried 3m products and virtually everything else with no luck. That's when my lovely wife came out with a spray bottle of diluted bleach. Worked so well it literally pissed me off! Save your money and go buy some cheap, generic bleach at Dollar General. You'll be glad you did!
customer_reviews.author: R. Martin

customer_reviews.title: CLR Mold and Mildew
customer_reviews.text: I used in in my shower and it WORKED like a charm. I sprayed it on the mildewed areas and let it set for a minute, and with a semi-hard bristle brush I scrubbed the mildew off. It really WORK!
customer_reviews.author: Frances

customer_reviews.title: So-so Results
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't find in the store so I purchased here. It did not work on stains in the caulking on my tub, but it did work as an overall cleaner and made the grout look cleaner. I did not notice any harsh smell so that was a plus. I did turn on the fan and open a nearby window though in case.
customer_reviews.author: VGG

customer_reviews.title: ehhh!! not sure about this product, I ...
customer_reviews.text: ehhh !! not sure about this product, I bought it for the bathroom and it didn't help removing the mold from the tiles at all.
customer_reviews.author: eve

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes work, sometimes not
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this to get rid of the mold accumulated in the front load washing machine (seeing how easy mold was removed from their advertisement), but was disappointed that it only took off a little and not even half of the mold. But I did get better luck with it in our shower stall floor which was covered with orange and white muck (fully removed the orange coloring but not the white calcium/water stain), and the shower curtain had mold spots and orange stain near bottom (again, the orange, or most of it, was removed and most of the mold spots were nearly removed after scrubbing it quite a bit).
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy L.

customer_reviews.title: Some products available is local store work as well or better.
customer_reviews.text: Works Ok. Some products available is local store work as well or better.
customer_reviews.author: brad

customer_reviews.title: It's the best product out there
customer_reviews.text: We have been using CLR Mold & Mildew stain remover for years. It's the best product out there!

customer_reviews.title: Leaked
customer_reviews.text: Do not know. Leaked inside & outside of the bag it came in. Can't read the instructions either.
customer_reviews.author: L.

customer_reviews.title: Don't take off mold of the front door of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't take off mold of the front door of the washer machine, That was the reason that I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Carlos Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Worked well!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! I etched our marble vanity by spilling vinegar on it. I rubbed a bit of this on it, and the problem was fixed! My only wish is that it worked on granite as well, since I now have a bunch of it and only one marble surface that might need it again.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: CLR MOLD REMOVER
customer_reviews.text: No. It did not work. I still have mold on the rubber in my washer. Does not live up to the commercials and it was expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Interlande

customer_reviews.title: Complete Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the purpose of removing mildew from my boats tan bimini top. It is heavily mildewed. I soaked the bimini in the CLR, and rubbed it in with a brush. I waited 20 minutes or so, and came back and repeated. I did this a total of 3 times. The following morning, after letting the product soak, I did not see any change in the amount, or darkness of the mildew. The CLR was a complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: CLR should take off market doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: This does not work at all was a complete waste off my time and money. c LR should take it off market
customer_reviews.author: Denise Dones

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work at all
customer_reviews.text: I saw this on a commercial being used on a washing machine gasket exactly like my washing machine with the same mold problem. I sprayed it on as soon as I got it and it didn't look anything like the foam in the commercial. Sure enough when I wiped and scrubbed and scrubbed it off nothing happened. Don't waste your money!!! Plus they say they are environmentally friendly, but this stuff is NOXIOUS!
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Wow, a great product. Was the only thing I tried that worked great
customer_reviews.author: Finian McElhany

customer_reviews.title: Mildew Stain Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: My hubby used this product on two of our bathrooms, upstairs and down. He coated the areas he wanted clean with it, he let it sit for about 15 minutes and went back wet/wiped the surfaces off. They all came clean, sparkling clean. The only drawback is while it sets it has a pungent odor. Once the surfaces are wet/wiped off, the scent disappears.
customer_reviews.author: BeckyIiz Sizbicki

customer_reviews.title: but like all the rest this one failed
customer_reviews.text: I was praying that something would take the black mold/mildew stains out of the caulk joints and seams in our downstairs shower stall, but this product didn't even begin to remove ANY of it. I've tried many other products claiming they will perform magically to remove these stains, but like all the rest this one failed, too.
customer_reviews.author: Anita L. Hoover

customer_reviews.title: Bummer......
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions and it did little to take care of any mold in our shower. The Tilex works but you need a gas mask so I was hoping that this would work. Yes the smell is minimal but if it does not work then what’s the point. I even tried scrubbing with brushes....
customer_reviews.author: Harry Pankratz

customer_reviews.title: Products seem not to work for me
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought this product wasn't working because the textures of my shower walls. However I try this product on several different texture of walls in my house it did not remove any mildew or mode. In fact it didn't even lighten the surface I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Marge

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what you want to happen - spray on the product, wait 10 minutes and wipe clean with a dry cloth. Got rid of all the mildew stains on my vinyl patio furniture. No scrubbing, just wipe away!
customer_reviews.author: Mike B.

customer_reviews.title: no way
customer_reviews.text: sorry, but this stuff doesnt do much at all, and I am upset that this product has the name it does.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Doesn't have bleach to stink for hours after you use it
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Doesn't have bleach to stink for hours after you use it. 2-bottles for close to the price i formerly paid in stores. But it doesn't go a long way & you have to keep applying it. A friend said "AMAZON doesn't have the overhead of local stores that's why it's cheaper." REALLY? Do you think huge warehouses for shipping, equipment, labor, trucks, maintenance, and other expenses like payroll, insurance, and property taxes, are not part of overhead? I had a business for 50-years. I know all about overhead expenses...they can kill you.
customer_reviews.author: Viking Palm Beach

customer_reviews.title: CLR PB-CMM-6 Mold and Mildew Stain Remover, 32...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well on stubborn mildew in shower but expect that this will require several applications.
customer_reviews.author: Donald J. Weinshank

customer_reviews.title: Mold Be Gone!
customer_reviews.text: Although it didn't remove the dark stain from the rubber in my washer, I am totally satisfied because it god rid of the odor.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Seller came through for us...thank you!
customer_reviews.text: This product works better than ANY others we’ve purchased. However somewhere along item was delivered damaged,and leaking, out from packing box! Come on now...how did the driver not see it?! But the seller has been very nice and refunded our money,without returning it,which pretty much would have been quite the mess! So to the seller,I thank you very much,and definitely will continue using this product!
customer_reviews.author: Zara's mama

customer_reviews.title: This is NO Tilex
customer_reviews.text: I really didn't like this product. I really wanted tilex but was unable to get. This doesn't remove the black spots easily, you need to scrub. I wouldn't buy it again, or recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye, soap scum!
customer_reviews.text: This is a miracle on glass shower surfaces. Cuts through soap scum and with a little scrubbing it is absolutely clear again. I love this stuff. Highly recommend. Does have a bit of a chemical odor, be sure to keep the area ventilated.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen S.

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Does nothing. Not even remotely. Vinegar and baking soda worked 10 times better.
customer_reviews.author: JJMI

customer_reviews.title: Not substitute for bathroom cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Helped clean the shower curtain but bid nothing for the grout and tile.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This works great for cleaning my boat seats and more.
customer_reviews.author: John O.

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy bottle leaked and ruined my floor
customer_reviews.text: Started leaking as I walked across my laminate floor, ruined the finish.
customer_reviews.author: Artisan

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work at all. Used another product which worked perfectly. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: K N

product_meta.title: CLR Mold & Mildew Stain Remover, Spray Bottle, 32 Ounce (Packaging May Vary)
feature_bullets: POWERFUL CLEAN: This powerful foam spray removes tough mold and mildew stains from tile, showers, bathroom surfaces, tents, hardwood floors, hard plastics, automobile tires, wood, grout and fiberglass.
FAST-ACTING: CLR Mold & Mildew Stain Remover can quickly remove tough surface mold and mildew stains. This bleach-free remover has a foam sprayer that allows for a more direct application.

MULTI-PURPOSE: Effective on a wide variety of surfaces including painted walls, ceramic tile, hardwood floors, baseboards, fabrics, glass, metal, brick, concrete, marble & laminated countertops. Great for boat cushions and outdoor furniture.

EFFECTIVE: The trigger spray handle helps to evenly apply the stain remover over large & hard-to-reach areas. The foaming solution helps prevent splash-back & helps maximize contact time on cleaning surface

ALL KINDS OF CLEAN: CLR offers products for all of your household needs including Mold & Mildew Stain Remover, Septic System Treatment, Stainless Steel Cleaner, Bath & Kitchen Cleaner & Power Plumber.
